name: AOS#Al-Suhail
flavor: Crucible variant. The fieldweave skull-wrap develops its own reflex pathways with use.

name: Apex Harmonic
flavor: If disconnected, each half of the brain can express its own personality and thoughts. Sometimes this is useful

name: Apotheosis Veil
flavor: Most helmets protect the mind from the universe. Not this one.

name: Astrocyte Verse
flavor: "The ideocosm contained within this helm transforms the wearer's head from flesh and/or exoneurons to the pure, raw stuff of thought."

name: Astrolord Hood
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Aura Purge
flavor: In the clamor of battle, a Warlock's mind is the eye of the storm.

name: Axiom Coven
flavor: The sleek housing conceals filigreed waveguides, ready to slip through the scalp and interface with the brain.

name: Azoth Bend
flavor: Transmutation is the art of a butterfly's breath becoming a hurricane.

name: Barkhan Dune
flavor: "There could be whole cities beneath the sand, right beneath our feet!"

name: Bindcaster
flavor: "To subsume another's will in your own." —Toland, the Shattered

name: Blind Jackal Mask
flavor: "Even the dead are not beyond our reach." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Born Spark
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost using nearby mass, this fieldweave handles life support and little else.

name: Bright Guard
flavor: Truth shines like a star in the endless night.

name: Chroma Vow
flavor: "As a Warlock ascends, the helmet becomes more than mere protection. Something must anchor the mind as it soars."

name: Chroma White
flavor: One of the tower's Warlock circles donated this helmet for the use of their newly reborn brethren.

name: Circuit Runner
flavor: The spark ignites the flame.

name: Code Fire
flavor: The ceremonial hoods of the first Warlocks directed attention to their words rather than their identities.

name: Cormorant Line
flavor: Those of the Cormorant Seal must prove themselves willing to give their lives to others.

name: Cultist's Hood
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Dead Light Hood
flavor: "Listen. Some stars won't stop calling to us." —Arach Linde

name: Deathsinger's Gaze
flavor: The unnerving awareness of the watcher being watched.

name: Desolate Veil
flavor: A smell of ozone. A distant scream. A feeling of dread.

name: Devouring Maw
flavor: Our enemies hunger for our knowledge.

name: Dujiao Shou
flavor: Practicality is fine in the short term, but I prefer to think of the big picture." —Wen Jie

name: Dusk Tread
flavor: Shuck the body. Keep the mind.

name: Eclipse Maw
flavor: "If the Vex have secrets to offer, then I will learn them from the smoke of their ruin."

name: Elector's Hood
flavor: Hide your face, but let your voice be heard.

name: Enigma Burn
flavor: The practical-minded dismiss philosophy. The scholarly remind them that war is just applied ontology.

name: Extropy Morph
flavor: Particle zoology is a curious hobby. It's of little use in the Crucible, except as a reminder that everything can break.

name: Fatekiller Hood
flavor: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

name: Façade of the Hezen Lords
flavor: The helm's nerve interface incorporates Vex cells. They're dead, of course. But not too dead to dream…

name: Haliaetus
flavor: Crucible variant. Unmyelinated fieldweave in a slipform design.

name: Harrowed Mouth of Ur
flavor: For the more Light the worms consume, the hungrier they become.

name: Headpiece of the Jade Rabbit
flavor: Where one person sees a god, another sees only a shadow on the moon." —Ikora Rey

name: Heliopause Hood
flavor: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

name: Hood of No Tomorrow
flavor: The fiercest contest lies ahead. This is irrefutable.

name: Hood of the Exile
flavor: "Don't you find it strange that the one called The Speaker rarely has anything useful to say?" —Sayings of the Disciples

name: Hood of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Hood of the Sojourn
flavor: The enemy stands between us and our salvation. Open the way.

name: ISTANU-GNT Razor
flavor: I am an ISTANU-GNT SEALED HEADCASE. I will watch your greatest deeds, and remember.

name: Immanent War Hood
flavor: Guard your mind against attacks from without and within.

name: Infinite Lines Hood
flavor: "I saw Darkness. No Light, no Earth, no air. Only Darkness. I...I can't breathe..." —RECORD 342-CHASM-6827

name: Iron Breed Hood
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Hood
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Felwinter, he who stared into the Void.

name: Iron Companion Hood
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Hood
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Justicar's Hood
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Kallipolis Hood
flavor: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

name: Keeper's Mind
flavor: "Crows fly far. Bring us whispers of things to come." —Variks

name: Kellbreaker's Mind
flavor: The death of a Kell avenges more than blood. The untold xenottabytes of data lost to their scavenging is deserving of retribution as well.

name: Light Beyond Nemesis
flavor: These are the wings of pratiya-samutpada, the truth of interconnectedness. The everywhere Light.

name: Locus Watcher
flavor: As the magnitude of the threat increases, so does the need for coordinated action.

name: Logic Singer
flavor: A Warlock's helmet bristles with tiny, precise sensors - each one attuned to an individual nerve in the brain.

name: Manifold Seeker
flavor: The clean geometry of the helmet reflects the clarity and decision of the mind within.

name: Momentum Guard
flavor: The dreamer reaches for the sun. The survivor knows when it is out of reach.

name: Monolith Bleed
flavor: Listen for the protests of weak minds breaking - crying out that their defeat was an error, a mistake.

name: Mouth of Ur
flavor: For the more Light the worms consume, the hungrier they become.

name: Nemesis Plane
flavor: Some early Warlock orders embraced anonymity, preferring to walk in public with a concealing hood.

name: Nerigal Savant
flavor: The enemy is only another algorithm. Simplify it, solve it, and set it in its place.

name: Obsidian Mind
flavor: Power from the ash.

name: Order's Hood
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Pariah Hood
flavor: "The sun must set before it will rise again." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Queen's Guard Hood
flavor: "Show me all that I have yet to rule."

name: Racing Wings
flavor: Take flight.

name: Raven Sheath
flavor: Go forth and witness the wonders of our time.

name: Salicin Fen
flavor: "Why a willow tree? It was his only roof. The swamp had consumed everything else." —The Five Lives of Albios

name: Samsara
flavor: "Personally, I've lost track of how many times I've died." —Ikora Rey

name: Scalpel Wing
flavor: If overwhelmed by the complexity of your own powers, fall back on the ancient mantra. Observe. Orient. Act. Repeat.

name: Seraph
flavor: "Maybe we were someplace good, you know. And then the Ghosts took us away."

name: Skull of Dire Ahamkar
flavor: Reality is the finest flesh, oh bearer mine. And are you not…hungry?

name: Solo Clade
flavor: Start anew.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Symmetry Fang
flavor: There are six factors in true Csikszentmihalyian flow. First is the loss of self.

name: THE STAG
flavor: Oh, deer goodness!

name: Talion Grace
flavor: A certain keyphrase will induce megalomania, for battles that demand the fury of a terrible will.

name: Tengu Operant
flavor: Do not allow the quest for knowledge to become paralytic. Only through action can you iterate on your belief.

name: Terra Bide
flavor: This was our home. It will be again.

name: The Ram
flavor: ...PRAISE ME...

name: The Waiting Crown
flavor: Enough talk. The time has come for action.

name: Unity Clade
flavor: "It can be difficult to lead Hunters. I suggest you hint you're from a future where they've all died."

name: Vanth Orcus 0A0X
flavor: Crucible variant. Unmyelinated fieldweave can induce sensations of invincibility.

name: Vector Oath
flavor: Those who stare into the roiling eye see only a hint of the potential within.

name: Viper Spine
flavor: Behold - the bearer of Light.

name: Temporis Floe IV
flavor: Consider the frost. Sometimes its bites do not heal. To amputate is the only way to be truly whole.

name: Raku Izumi IV
flavor: Crucible variant. Both a defensive tool and a shrine to a Warlock's greatest weapon.

name: High Command Hood
flavor: This is the face of justice.

name: Eon Tracer Hood
flavor: "It's too much… turn it off… let me out!" —RECORD-449-CHASM-6263

name: Endling Hood
flavor: We will only be extinct when the last of us is gone.

name: Red Miasma Hood
flavor: This sounds like it could be invaluable to Exodus colonists. But Malahayati has some concerns. ~SIVA.MEM.CL009

name: Iron Saga Hood
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Hadron Gale IV
flavor: The closer you look, the more chaos you will find.

name: Days of Iron Crown
flavor: "When the Last of Lords unfurled the Banner once again, who took up arms to march beneath it?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cobra's Vigil Hood
flavor: "We watch, and we wait. And we train." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Astrocyte Verse
flavor: The ideocosm contained within this helm transforms the wearer's head from flesh and/or exoneurons to the pure, raw stuff of thought.

name: Hood of Triumph
flavor: This hood covers a mind that encompasses universes and the births and deaths of stars.
